responses.defaultError: I can't get my latency right now... Try again later

kick.name: kick
kick.description: Kick a member from the server

member.name: member
member.description: The member you want to kick

reason.name: reason
reason.description: The reason for kicking the member

responses.noPermissionsError: I can't kick {{member}} from {{guild}}. Make sure I have `KICK_MEMBERS` permission
responses.higherRoleError: I can't kick {{member}} from {{guild}}. Make sure my role is higher than the member's role
responses.unreachableError: The kick direct message couldn't be sent to {{member}}. The member is unreachable

ban.name: ban
ban.description: Ban a member from the server

member.name: member
member.description: The member you want to ban

delete_messages.name: delete_messages
delete_messages.description: Delete the member's messages from the past 7 days?

reason.name: reason
reason.description: The reason for banning the member

responses.noPermissionsError: I can't ban {{member}} from {{guild}}. Make sure I have `BAN_MEMBERS` permission
responses.higherRoleError: I can't ban {{member}} from {{guild}}. Make sure my role is higher than the member's role
responses.unreachableError: The ban direct message couldn't be sent to {{member}}. The member is unreachable

unban.name: unban
unban.description: Unban a user from the server

id.name: id
id.description: The id of the user you want to unban

reason.name: reason
reason.description: The reason for unbanning the user

responses.noPermissionsError: I can't unban {{member}} from {{guild}}. Make sure I have `BAN_MEMBERS` permission

delete_messages.name: delete_messages
delete_messages.description: Delete a number of messages in a specific channel

amount.name: amount
amount.description: The number of messages to delete

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel where the messages will be deleted

responses.noPermissionsError: I can't delete messages from {{channel}}. Make sure I have `MANAGE_MESSAGES` permission
